QuestData.Title: What Illidan Wants, Illidan Gets...
QuestData.Description: Take this disguise and enter Eclipse Point. Once inside, use the disguise to cloak yourself. The Eclipsion blood elves will be unable to see through the disguise, thereby granting you safe passage to Grand Commander Ruusk.$B$BOnce you find Ruusk, tell him where next to move the cipher. You're going to have to act your heart out, $n. Play it off as if you are his superior, delivering a message from his lord. That should do it!$B$BOh - watch out for the dragonhawks as they see through the disguise.
QuestData.LogDescription: Borak, Son of Oronok at the bridge near Eclipse Point in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to Deliver Illidan's Message to Grand Commander Ruusk at Eclipse Point.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Borak, Son of Oronok in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.CompletionText: The disguise is delicate. Almost any action, aside from walking, will disrupt the magic holding it together.
QuestData.RewardText: Now all you need to do is go get the cipher. Easy, right?
